MainInfo.headerTitle: Great Limbus Library is a fan site and database
MainInfo.headerDescription: developed by the community, dedicated to Limbus Company.

NavigationSection.statuses: Information about buffs, debuffs and other statuses
NavigationSection.tierlist: Tier lists of Identities, EGOs and Passives

ToDoSection.3: General improvements to the site's interface and content
ToDoSection.contactUs: If you have ideas or suggestions, please contact us

TierListPage.title: Tier List
TierListPage.description: Only the tier of Identities/EGO matters. Within tiers, the position of Identities/EGO is NOT a ranking of strength.

description.SSS: These Identities/EGOs are capable of effortlessly overcoming any in-game content.
description.SS: Very powerful Identities/EGOs that just fall short of entering the SSS category.
description.S: Strong Identities/EGOs that handle diverse content successfully but can be replaced by even more powerful representatives from the SS tier.
description.A: Average Identities/EGOs with some strengths but also with weaknesses.
description.B: Comparatively weak Identities/EGOs that should be chosen only in cases of extreme necessity.
description.C: Ineffective Identities/EGOs; it's best to avoid choosing them as they are incapable of successfully accomplishing in-game tasks.

Filters.empty: The list is empty, but you can fix it by clearing some of the filters
